ygData.subject: RE: Even more on ebw...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Okay, I don t THINK anyone said this before. Just what level is Arlena? Doable with a party of 4-6 lvl 20s (+-2 lvls)? If it is, I m kicking my friends
ygData.messageBody:
> You get the hilt by giving Arlena's lute to Grimrot. He also gives you a
> note, which you take to Dekam N'Tazi in Qeynos. Give him the
> note, he gives
> you the mold. Then get some electrum, have a friend enchant it,
> then combine
> the hilt and electrum in the mold.
>
> DV

Okay, I don't THINK anyone said this before. Just what level is Arlena?
Doable with a party of 4-6 lvl 20s (+-2 lvls)? If it is, I'm kicking my
friends into gear and we are going to do this. :)

Thanks,
Jeremy

ps Glad to see this list still going a little at least. :)
